scraped_articles.title: 7 Bruce Willis Movies You Need to Watch
scraped_articles.meta_description: Bruce Willis is a legendary actor who has starring many iconic films throughout his career. Here is our top pick of Bruce Willis movies you should watch.
scraped_articles.content:
7 Bruce Willis Movies You Need to Watch

7 Bruce Willis Movies You Need to Watch

Must-Watch Bruce Willis Movie

Bruce Willis is a well-known Hollywood actor with an impressive resume of movies under his belt. If you're a fan of action-packed thrillers, heartfelt dramas, or mind-bending mysteries, Bruce Willis has something for everyone. Here are some of the best movies starring Bruce Willis that you need to watch:

1. Die Hard (1988)

- IMDb: 8.2
- Rotten Tomatoes: 94%
- Available on: Vudu, Amazon Prime Video, Apple TV.

Die Hard

"Die Hard" is a classic action film that solidified Bruce Willis's status as an action star. In this movie, Willis plays the role of John McClane, a New York City police officer who finds himself fighting against terrorists in a Los Angeles skyscraper. With heart-pounding action sequences and Willis's charismatic performance, "Die Hard" is a must-watch for action movie enthusiasts.

2. Pulp Fiction (1994)

- IMDb: 8.9
- Rotten Tomatoes: 92%
- Available on: Max, Vudu, Amazon Prime Video, Apple TV.

Pulp Fiction

Directed by Quentin Tarantino, "Pulp Fiction" is a cult classic that showcases Bruce Willis's acting chops in a unique way. Willis plays the role of Butch Coolidge, a boxer caught up in a web of crime and betrayal. His performance in this film is both intense and unforgettable, making "Pulp Fiction" a must-see for movie buffs.

3. The Sixth Sense (1999)

- IMDb: 8.2
- Rotten Tomatoes: 86%
- Available on: Vudu, Amazon Prime Video, Apple TV.

The Sixth Sense

In this supernatural thriller, Bruce Willis stars as Dr. Malcolm Crowe, a child psychologist who tries to help a young boy who claims to see ghosts. "The Sixth Sense" is known for its twist ending and Willis's nuanced portrayal of a troubled protagonist. This movie is a perfect blend of suspense and drama that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

4. 12 Monkeys (1995)

- IMDb: 8.0
- Rotten Tomatoes: 88%
- Available on: Vudu, Amazon Prime Video, Apple TV.

12 Monkeys

In this sci-fi thriller, Bruce Willis plays James Cole, a convict sent back in time to prevent a deadly virus from destroying humanity. "12 Monkeys" is a mind-bending film that showcases Willis's ability to portray complex characters in a suspenseful and thought-provoking narrative.

5. Die Hard with a Vengeance (1995)

- IMDb: 7.6
- Rotten Tomatoes: 59%
- Available on: Vudu, Amazon Prime Video, Apple TV.

Die Hard with a Vengeance

As the third installment in the Die Hard series, "Die Hard with a Vengeance" reunites Bruce Willis as John McClane with Samuel L. Jackson in a race against time to stop a terrorist threat in New York City. This action-packed film is a rollercoaster ride of excitement and thrills that will keep you entertained from start to finish.

6. Armageddon (1998)

- IMDb: 6.7
- Rotten Tomatoes: 43%
- Available on: Vudu, Amazon Prime Video, Apple TV.

Armageddon 

In this epic disaster film, Bruce Willis stars as Harry Stamper, the leader of a team of oil drillers sent into space to prevent an asteroid from colliding with Earth. "Armageddon" is a thrilling and emotional movie that showcases Willis's heroic side in the face of impending catastrophe.

7. Nobody's Fool (1994)

- IMDb: 7.3
- Rotten Tomatoes: 91%
- Available on: Vudu, Amazon Prime Video, Apple TV.

Nobody's Fool

In this comedy-drama film, Bruce Willis plays Carl Roebuck, a construction worker with a shady past who finds himself entangled in the lives of the residents of a small town. Willis delivers a standout performance in a more understated role, showing his range as an actor beyond action films.

scraped_articles.title: 5 Scary Facts About Deep Ocean You May Never know
scraped_articles.meta_description: The following terrifying facts are not only to scare you, but also to increase your knowledge of the deep ocean.
scraped_articles.content:
5 Scary Facts About Deep Ocean You May Never know

The following terrifying facts are not only to scare you, but also to increase your knowledge of the deep ocean.

5 Scary Facts About Deep Ocean You May Never know

The deeper you go into the ocean, the more immense the pressure becomes. At depths like the Mariana Trench, over 36,000 feet below sea level, the pressure is more than 1,000 times that at the surface.

If a human were to dive this deep without protection, the force would be enough to crush them instantly. Even the toughest submarines must be specifically engineered to withstand these extreme conditions, and most fail if pushed too deep.

Crushing Pressure

The deep ocean is one of the least explored regions on Earth, with over 80% remaining unmapped and unseen by human eyes. Scientists estimate that thousands, if not millions, of species live in these depths, many of which are potentially dangerous or alien-like in appearance.

In fact, each deep-sea expedition often discovers entirely new species, some with terrifying features such as bioluminescent lures, razor-sharp teeth, and transparent skin.

Unknown Species

Some of the largest and most bizarre creatures thrive in the deep ocean. One of the most notorious is the giant squid, which can grow up to 40 feet long and has eyes the size of dinner plates to see in the pitch black.

Another is the colossal squid, which has been known to have hooks on its tentacles. These rarely seen predators remind us that the deep ocean is home to creatures that defy the limits of what we think is possible.

Giant Predators

Deep-sea volcanoes and hydrothermal vents create dangerous environments where temperatures can reach up to 750°F, hot enough to melt lead. These vents are home to bizarre ecosystems that live off chemicals emitted by the vents, rather than sunlight.

An unexpected eruption can release toxic gases, cause massive underwater landslides, or create tsunamis, impacting life on the surface.

Underwater Volcanic Eruptions

There are areas in the deep ocean known as "oxygen minimum zones," where oxygen levels are so low that only the hardiest organisms can survive. In these regions, life forms have adapted in strange and often frightening ways, like scavenging dead animals in near-anoxic conditions.

These zones, often described as "dead zones," can expand with climate change and pollution, suffocating marine life over vast areas.

Oxygen Minimum Zones (OMZs)

scraped_articles.title: 'Home Alone' Original House Is On Sale For $6 Million!
scraped_articles.content:
'Home Alone' Original House Is On Sale For $6 Million!

"Home Alone" iconic house where Kevin McCallister face two burglars is now on sale.

'Home Alone' Original House Is On Sale For $6 Million!

Kevin McCallister house in Chicago is on sale for $5.25 million.

"Home Alone" iconic house where Kevin McCallister face two burglars is now on sale, according to Zillow Listing.

The house, which was built in 1921, is at 671 Lincoln Avenue, in the Chicago suburb of Winnetka, Ill.

It is now reportedly on the market and sale for $5.25 million.

The 9,126 square feet house has four fireplaces, five bedrooms and six bathrooms, as well as an outdoor and indoor hot tub.

Several iconic parts are still there, including the staircase where little Kevin goes sledding by himself as his family is in holiday.

Zillow listing announce the house sale in a live event on Friday.

“It’s a chance to own a piece of cinematic history,” said the listing.

However, this isn't the first time McCallister's house is on sale.

The house is known to have sold multiple times and it was last sold in 2012 for $1.59 million.

In fact, this house was rented by AirBnB back in 2021 for those who want to spend their holiday to stay at the McCallister's for one night.

Devin Ratray, the actor who played Kevin’s brother, Buzz, welcomed guests into the house.

Would you considering to buy the iconic house of McCallister's from Home Alone?

scraped_articles.title: Top 5 Introverted and Handsome Hollywood Actors
scraped_articles.meta_description: These actors show how introversion and a reflective nature can enhance charisma and make them standout stars in Hollywood.
scraped_articles.content:
Top 5 Introverted and Handsome Hollywood Actors

Keanu Reeves

Keanu Reeves is renowned for his smoldering good looks and enigmatic presence, accentuated by his soulful eyes and a rugged jawline.

Known for his roles in The Matrix and John Wick, Reeves is the epitome of a humble and introspective Hollywood star. He avoids extravagant displays of fame, often spotted riding the subway or quietly engaging in philanthropic activities.

Reeves’ introverted nature is reflected in his thoughtful approach to his craft, portraying characters with profound emotional depth. This balance of mystery, kindness, and talent has cemented him as one of Hollywood's most beloved icons.

Cillian Murphy

Cillian Murphy, with his strikingly sharp cheekbones and piercing blue eyes, exudes an aura of quiet intensity.

The star of Peaky Blinders, Murphy is a self-described introvert who prefers his private life over the trappings of celebrity culture. Known for avoiding large-scale social events, he finds solace in the quiet of his family home in Ireland.

His reserved nature allows him to immerse himself deeply in his characters, delivering some of the most nuanced performances in modern cinema. Murphy’s enigmatic charm and powerful screen presence make him both a captivating actor and a uniquely handsome figure in Hollywood.

Timothée Chalamet

Timothée Chalamet is the poster boy for modern, understated charm.

With his curly hair, delicate jawline, and dreamy hazel eyes, Chalamet has become a heartthrob for a generation. Despite his meteoric rise in films like Call Me by Your Name and Dune, Chalamet remains introverted and thoughtful.

He often speaks about feeling shy and overwhelmed in large social settings, preferring close-knit conversations to the spotlight. His introspective personality is evident in his performances, where he brings vulnerability and authenticity to every role.

Tom Hiddleston

Tom Hiddleston’s refined good looks, with his chiseled jawline, expressive eyes, and graceful demeanor, make him a standout in Hollywood.

Best known for his role as Loki in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, Hiddleston balances his charismatic on-screen persona with a calm and introverted off-screen presence.

A classically trained actor, he often speaks about his love for literature and theater, reflecting his introspective nature. Hiddleston’s charm lies in his ability to combine his reserved personality with an effortless sophistication, making him a favorite among fans.

Ryan Gosling

Ryan Gosling, with his effortlessly handsome looks, charming smile, and piercing gaze, has been a Hollywood heartthrob for years.

Known for films like La La Land and The Notebook, Gosling is a quintessential introvert who prefers to let his work speak for itself. He avoids excessive media attention and is rarely seen in the glitz of Hollywood.

His quiet and down-to-earth personality are a perfect match for the deep emotional resonance he brings to his roles. Gosling’s ability to blend vulnerability with masculinity makes him one of the most compelling and attractive actors of his generation.

scraped_articles.title: 35 Funny Friend Quotes to Share with Your Bestie
scraped_articles.meta_description: These quotes are perfect for reminiscing about old memories or just enjoying each other's company.
scraped_articles.content:
35 Funny Friend Quotes to Share with Your Bestie

These quotes are perfect for reminiscing about old memories or just enjoying each other's company. (Photo by Avie Huff on Unsplash)

35 Funny Friend Quotes to Share with Your Bestie

Funny friends make life more entertaining, don't they?

If you need a good laugh or just want to brighten your bestie's day, you come to the right place! In this article, we have collected 35 funny friend quotes that are sure to tickle your funny bone and make you smile. 

These quotes are perfect for reminiscing about old memories or just enjoying each other's company. These funny friend quotes are perfect to share with your best friend.

So, grab your favorite snacks, relax with your friends, and get ready to laugh together at these witty and interesting funny friend quotes.

A. Funny Friend Quotes to Share

1. “Everyone is a complicated human being, and everyone is strong and weak and funny and scared.” —Laverne Cox

2. “Fan the sinking flame of hilarity with the wing of friendship; and pass the rosy wine. ” —Charles Dickens

3 . “To like and dislike the same things, that is what makes a solid friendship.” —Sallust

4. “Marriage: a friendship recognized by the police.” —Robert Louis Stevenson

5. "You and I are more than friends. We're like a really small gang." - Unknown

6. "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you... even when you're a little crazy." - Unknown

7. "We'll be friends until we're old and senile... Then, we'll be new friends!" - Unknown

8. “A good friend will always stab you in the front.” —Oscar Wilde

9. “Never contract friendship with a man that is not better than thyself.” —Confucius

10. “It’s the friends you can call up at 4 a.m. that matter.” —Marlene Dietrich

11. "Friends don't let friends do silly things alone... especially if it involves embarrassing Snapchat filters." - Unknown

12. “It takes your enemy and your friend, working together, to hurt you to the heart: the one to slander you and the other to get the news to you.” —Mark Twain

13. “A messy house is a must—it separates your true friends from other friends. Real friends are there to visit you not your house!” —Jennifer Wilson

14. “I do not want people to be very agreeable, as it saves me the trouble of liking them a great deal.” —Jane Austen

15. “There is nothing better than a friend, unless it’s a friend with chocolate.” —Linda Grayson

B. Funny Friend Quotes Make You Laugh Together

1. “Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.” —Oprah Winfrey

2. “All you need to do to be my friend is like me.” —Taylor Swift

3. “Every man should have a fair-sized cemetery in which to bury the faults of his friends.” —Henry Brooks Adams

4. “I’ll stick to finding the funny in the ordinary because my life is pretty ordinary and so are the lives of my friends—and my friends are hilarious.” —Issa Rae

5. "Friends come and go like waves of the ocean, but the true ones stick like an octopus on your face." - Unknown

6. "True friends don't judge each other. They judge other people together." - Unknown

7. "We're best friends because we both know the same swear words and use them excessively." - Unknown

8. "A best friend is like a four-leaf clover: hard to find and lucky to have." - Unknown

9. "Good friends don't let you do stupid things... alone." - Unknown

10. "A true friend is someone who thinks you're a good egg even though they know you're slightly cracked." - Unknown

11. "You don't have to be crazy to be my friend. I'll train you." - Unknown

12. "I'm lucky to have a friend like you... even if you did let me make a fool of myself last night." - Unknown

13. "I love that our effortless friendship fits perfectly with my laziness." - Unknown

14. "You're the friend I'd share my last cookie with... even if it was a really, really good cookie." - Unknown

15. "I don't know what's tighter: our jeans or our friendship." - Unknown

16. “When you’re in jail, a good friend will be trying to bail you out. A best friend will be in the cell next to you saying, ‘Damn, that was fun.'” —Groucho Marx

17. “You find out who your real friends are when you’re involved in a scandal.” —Elizabeth Taylor

18. "We'll be the old ladies causing trouble in the nursing home together." - Unknown

19. "Friendship is like peeing your pants. Everyone can see it, but only you can feel its warmth." - Unknown

20. "I hope we're friends until we die. Then, I hope we stay ghost friends and walk through walls and scare the crap out of people." - Unknown

scraped_articles.title: Tteokbokki Recipe: 3 Exciting Variations for Korean Comfort in Every Bite
scraped_articles.meta_description: These tteokbokki recipes invite you to enjoy the delicious harmony of flavors part of this iconic Korean dish.
scraped_articles.content:
Tteokbokki Recipe: 3 Exciting Variations for Korean Comfort in Every Bite

Tteokbokki Recipe: 3 Exciting Variations for Korean Comfort in Every Bite

Tteokbokki is a beloved Korean street food.

It is a symphony of flavors and textures that capture the essence of comfort and luxury. In this culinary journey, we will explore tantalizing Tteokbokki recipes. Each variant is filled with different tastes and preferences. It ranges from vegan delights to non-spicy alternatives and those embracing the classic gochujang kick. Get ready to take a flavorful adventure.

Let's check out some variants of the tteokbokki recipe, compiled from numerous sources, on Thursday (16/11/2023).

Tteokbokki Recipe

pixabay/cursive1122

Tips On How To Make Tteokbokki

With these tips in mind, you're well on your way to preparing a delicious batch of Tteokbokki. Feel free to experiment and modify the ingredients to suit your taste choices. Tteokbokki is a delightful and popular Korean street food. Tteokbokki recipe is made with chewy rice cakes in a sweet and spicy sauce. Here are some tips to help you make delicious Tteokbokki at home:

  • Choose the Right Rice Cakes: Opt for fresh or refrigerated rice cakes (tteok) for the best texture. If using frozen rice cakes, thaw them before cooking.

  • Prepare a Flavorful Broth: Use a combination of anchovy and kelp to make a savory and umami-rich broth. If you prefer a vegetarian version, replace anchovy with vegetable broth.

  • Adjust Spice Levels: Control the spiciness by changing the amount of gochugaru (Korean red pepper flakes) and gochujang (Korean red pepper paste). Add more for extra heat, or reduce for a milder version.

  • Add Umami with Fish Cakes: Include Korean fish cakes (eomuk) for additional flavor and texture. These absorb the delicious sauce and complete the rice cakes.

  • Use High-Quality Gochujang: Invest in good-quality gochujang, as it is a crucial ingredient that contributes to the depth of flavor. Look for a brand with a balance of sweetness and spiciness.

  • Include Sweetness: Adjust the sweetness to your liking by adding sugar or honey. The sweetness balances the heat and enriches the overall taste.

  • Maintain the Right Texture: Cook the rice cakes until they are tender but still have a chewy texture. Overcooked rice cakes can become mushy, so watch their doneness.

  • Enhance with Vegetables: Add vegetables like cabbage, carrots, or green onions to introduce freshness and additional crunch to the dish.
  • Garnish Thoughtfully: Garnish your Tteokbokki with sliced green onions and sesame seeds. These elements make for a visually pretty presentation and added flavor.

  • Experiment with Add-ins: Customize your Tteokbokki by including other ingredients like boiled eggs, ramen noodles, or even cheese for a unique twist.

  • Be Patient with Simmering: Allow the Tteokbokki to simmer on low heat to allow the rice cakes to absorb the flavors of the sauce. It also helps in achieving the desired consistency.

  • Enjoy Freshly Cooked: Tteokbokki is best enjoyed fresh off the stove. The rice cakes are at their chewie, and the sauce is flavorful. Reheating may change the texture.

Tteokbokki Recipe Vegan

Ingredients:

  • 2 cups rice cakes (tteok)
  • 1 cup Korean fish cakes (eomuk), sliced (optional for vegan)
  • 1 cup cabbage, thinly sliced
  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • 1 cup water
  • 1 cup carrots, julienned
  • 4 tablespoons soy sauce
  • 2 tablespoons gochugaru (Korean red pepper flakes)
  • 2 tablespoons sesame oil
  • 1 tablespoon sugar
  • 1 tablespoon minced garlic
  • 1 tablespoon vegetable oil
  • Green onions and sesame seeds for garnish

Instructions:

1. In a large pan, heat vegetable oil over medium heat. Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant.

2. Pour in vegetable broth and water, followed by soy sauce, gochugaru, sesame oil, and sugar. Stir well to combine.

3. Add rice cakes, Korean fish cakes (if using), cabbage, and carrots. Simmer until the rice cakes are tender and the sauce thickens.

4. Garnish with chopped green onions and sesame seeds. Serve hot and savor the vegan twist on this Korean classic.

Tteokbokki Recipe Not Spicy

Ingredients:

  • 2 cups rice cakes (tteok)
  • 1 cup Korean fish cakes (eomuk), sliced
  • 1 cup napa cabbage, chopped
  • 4 cups chicken or vegetable broth
  • 1 cup water
  • 3 tablespoons soy sauce
  • 1 tablespoon sugar
  • 1 tablespoon minced garlic
  • 1 tablespoon vegetable oil
  • Green onions and sesame seeds for garnish

Instructions:


1. In a large pan, heat vegetable oil over medium heat. Add minced garlic and sauté briefly.

2. Pour in broth and water, followed by soy sauce and sugar. Stir until well combined.

3. Add rice cakes, Korean fish cakes, and napa cabbage. Simmer until the rice cakes are tender and the flavors meld.

Tteokbokki Recipe

4. Garnish with sliced green onions and a sprinkle of sesame seeds. Serve warm and relish the non-spicy allure of this Tteokbokki rendition.

Tteokbokki Recipe with Gochujang

Ingredients:

  • 2 cups rice cakes (tteok)
  • 1 cup Korean fish cakes (eomuk), sliced
  • 1 cup green cabbage, thinly sliced
  • 4 cups anchovy or vegetable broth
  • 1 cup water
  • 3 tablespoons gochujang (Korean red pepper paste)
  • 2 tablespoons soy sauce
  • 1 tablespoon sugar
  • 1 tablespoon minced garlic
  • 1 tablespoon vegetable oil
  • Green onions and sesame seeds for garnish

Instructions:

1. In a large pan, heat vegetable oil over medium heat. Add minced garlic and sauté until aromatic.

2. Combine broth, water, gochujang, soy sauce, and sugar in a pan. Stir until the ingredients form a cohesive sauce.

3. Add rice cakes, Korean fish cakes, and green cabbage. Simmer until the rice cakes are tender and the sauce thickens.


4. Garnish with green onions and sesame seeds. Serve piping hot and revel in the rich, spicy notes of this classic Tteokbokki recipe.

Tteokbokki Recipe

Dive into the world of Tteokbokki with these attractive variants. Each tteokbokki recipe promises a unique culinary experience.

Do you opt for vegan, non-spicy, or embrace the fiery charm of gochujang? These tteokbokki recipes invite you to enjoy the delicious harmony of flavors part of this iconic Korean dish. Happy cooking!

Tteokbokki Recipe

scraped_articles.content:
Kai Cenat Sleeping Get More Views Than Other Twitch Streamers

Kai was tired after defeating the boss in Elden Ring named Malenia.

Kai Cenat Sleeping Get More Views Than Other Twitch Streamers

This happened when Kai Cenat rest and keep the camera on after his 'Elden Ring' stream on Twitch.

Kai Cenat is recently playing 'Elden Ring' video game and stream it on Twitch.

When the stream was too long and tiredful, Kai Cenat decided to sleep while the camera is still recording, which let his viewers only see him sleeping.

Even so, Kai Cenat succeed to be the streamer with the most view.

He’s been sleeping on camera but successfully get 45k viewers.

Although the number is lower than his usual viewers count, this number is the highest on Twitch stream, according to Dexerto.

This puts him above any other Streamer on Twitch at the moment, including ongoing esports events and tournaments.

Kai was tired after defeating the boss in Elden Ring named Malenia.

Elden Ring, which is known for its high difficulty, was giving giving him a hard time due to the latest boss fight with Malenia.

He still has a few really hard bosses to get through though if he wants to beat the base game in time for the DLC.

scraped_articles.title: 65 Haters Quotes To Help You Deal With Their Hateful Comments
scraped_articles.meta_description: Are you feeling down because receiving so much hurtful comments from your haters? These haters quotes will help to comfort your heart.
scraped_articles.content:
65 Haters Quotes To Help You Deal With Their Hateful Comments

Are you dealing with someone who doesn't like you and is spreading negativity about you? Don't worry! These haters quotes will help to comfort your heart.

65 Haters Quotes To Help You Deal With Their Hateful Comments

Dealing with haters can be tough and tiring, but you're not alone. Haters can be found in various parts of your life, whether it's at work, school, or even within your own family. Their hurtful comments and negative opinions can be disheartening, but they also offer a chance for personal growth and resilience.

If you've ever felt down because of haters, you're in the right place. Haters quotes can be a source of solace and strength when you're faced with hurtful words. These quotes not only provide the courage to confront your haters but also offer a fresh perspective on the situation.

Haters Quotes

In this article, we have selected some of the best and most meaningful haters quotes from various sources, Thursday (2/11/2023). From inspiring quotes to humorous sayings, these quotes are sure to uplift your spirits and help you navigate the challenges posed by haters.

A. Funny Haters Quotes

1. "Don't think that just because you made it to the next level that the haters and naysayers disappear. Remember, new levels bring new devils." - Dr. Steve Maraboli

2. "Any fool can criticize, condemn and complain… and most do." - Dale Carnegie

3. "Love your haters - they're your biggest fans" - Kanye West

4. "Haters are my favorite. I've built an empire with the bricks they've thrown at me. Keep on hating." - CM Punk

5. "Normally, I try not to pay attention to my haters, but this time I'd like to talk about it, because my haters are my motivators." - Ellen DeGeneres

6. "If you don't like me, why do you waste your time making fun of me?" - Chad Anderson

7. "Give the haters another reason to hate!!" - Lilly Ghalichi

8. "Haters are just confused admirers." - Justin Bieber

9. "Jealousy is the best compliment you can receive!" - Unknown

10. "If you cannot be positive, then at least be quiet." - Joel Osteen

11. "Isn't it kind of silly to think that tearing someone else down builds you up?" - Sean Covey

12. "Rumors are carried by haters, spread by fools, and accepted by idiots." - Nishan Panwar

13. "The haters always scream the loudest." - Tucker Max

14. "You don't have to like me, I'm not a Facebook status." - Wiz Khalifa

15. "Behind every successful person lies a pack of Haters! I love my haters!” - Gloria Tesch

B. Inspirational Haters Quotes

1. "To anyone that ever told you you're no good.. they're no better." - Hayley Williams

2. "Hate hurts the hater more'n the hated." - Madeleine L'Engle

3. "Remember, people only rain on your parade because they're jealous of your sun and tired of their shade." - Kim Kardashian

4. "Haters are like crickets. Crickets make a lot of noise, you hear it but you can't see them, then right when you walk by them, they're quiet." - Israel Houghton

5. "Never mind what haters say, ignore them 'til they fade away." - T.I.

6. "Be who you want to be and not care about what others think." - Andy Biersack

7. "Haters...are all failures. It's 100% across the board. No one who is truly brilliant at anything is a hater." - Joe Rogan

8. "Haters only hate things they can't have and the people they can't be. It's just a little thing called jealousy." - Lil Wayne

9. "Don't give to anyone the power to put you down. Haters are losers pretending to be winners." - Paulo Coelho

10. "Haters will broadcast your failure, but whisper your success." - Drake

11. "Haters are just confused admirers because they can't figure out the reason why everyone loves you." - Jeffree Star

12. "Don't spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door." - Coco Chanel

13. "The best way to counter-attack a hater is to make it blatantly obvious that their attack has had no impact on you." - Tim Ferriss

14. "People that are obsessed with hating you, feel flattered. Their whole lives revolve around you." - Lady Gaga

15. "Hate is too great a burden to bear. It injures the hater more than it injures the hated." - Coretta Scott King

16. "Learn to use the criticism as fuel and you will never run out of energy." - Orrin Woodward

17. "Haters never win. I just think that's true about life, because negative energy always costs in the end." - Tom Hiddleston

18. "I have insecurities of course, but I don't hang out with anyone who points them out to me." - Adele

19. "Fear of something is at the root of hate for others, and hate within will eventually destroy the hater." - George Washington Carver

20. "Know that whoever is trying to bring you down, is already below you."

- Boonaa Mohammed

21. "The best way to torture haters is with your happiness. There's nothing people hate more than seeing you be successful." - Unknown

22. "Haters don't really hate you, they hate themselves; because you're a reflection of what they wish to be." - Yaira N

23. "Your self-worth is determined by you. You don't have to depend on someone telling you who you are." - Beyoncé

24. "There will always be haters. And the more you grow, the more they hate; the more they hate the more you grow." - Anthony Liccione

25. "Wish all your enemies a long life, so they can see you succeed in life."

- Nishan Panwar

© 2023 trstdly.com

C. Meaningful Haters Quotes

1. "No matter how good you are, someone is always going to be against you. But never let them be the limit of your success." - Terry Mark

2. "A haters job is to hate you, and they stay on their job 24/7. So, if you're expecting them to clock out, and leave you alone think again." - Sonya Parker

3. "Fear of something is at the root of hate for others, and hate within will eventually destroy the hater." - George Washington Carver

4. "Be so good they can't ignore you." - Steve Martin

5. They don't hate you. They hate themselves and take it out on you. There's a difference." - Ritu Ghatourey

6. "The hated man is the result of his hater's pride rather than his hater's conscience." - Criss Jami

7. "Respect your haters. They're the only ones who think you're better than them." - Nicki Minaj

8. "All haters are losers, even when they win." - Paulo Coelho

9. "Most haters are stuck in a poisonous mental prison of jealousy and self-doubt that blinds them to their own potentiality." - Steve Maraboli

10. "The only thing more frustrating than slanderers is those foolish enough to listen to them." - Criss Jami

11. "The Internet is for haters. Everyone wants to knock somebody down, but it's cool." - Andy Cohen

12. "Negative people are only happy when they bring you down to their level." - Unknown

13. "I think that everybody wants to be heard, and the easiest way to be the loudest is to be the hater." - ​Tavi Gevinson

14. "Expect while reaching for the stars, people to whirl by with their dark clouds and storm upon you." - Anthony Liccione

15. "I think people are just haters. When they see people doing well, some people, if there's something wrong, they'll pick at that." - Alana Blanchard

16. "(To the haters) You are not extinguishing the bright lights of mankind, you're simply burying yourself in an unmarked grave." - Stefan Molyneux

17. "It is easy to hate and it is difficult to love. This is how the whole scheme of things works. All good things are difficult to achieve; and bad things are very easy to get." - Confucius

18. "Having haters is just a part of the business, and the more haters you have, the more people like you—that's how I view it because I try to see the positive in things." - Nick Jonas

19. "Haters will see you walk on water and say it's because you can't swim." ― Unknown

20. "Believe in yourself and don't care about haters." - Perrie Edwards

21. "Remember that only God can judge us; forget the haters, because Somebody loves you." - Miley Cyrus

22. "Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that." – Martin Luther King, Jr.

23. "Being judged by others means that you're that important that they have the time to think about you and talk about you." – Unknown

24. "I don't think haters are small-minded; it's more tragic than that. I think they're great minded, but choose to sell themselves short every day. "– Steve Maraboli

25. "An entire sea of water can't sink a ship unless it gets inside the ship. Similarly, the negativity of the world can't put you down unless you allow it to get inside you." – Goi Nasu

scraped_articles.title: 'The Glory' Actress Park Ji Ah Dies at 52 After Battling Ischemic Stroke
scraped_articles.meta_description: Park Jia's agency confirmed the news of her death.
scraped_articles.content:
'The Glory' Actress Park Ji Ah Dies at 52 After Battling Ischemic Stroke

Her agency confirmed the news of her death. 

'The Glory' Actress Park Ji Ah Dies at 52 After Battling Ischemic Stroke

Actress Park Ji Ah, known for her role as Moon Dongeun's mother in the popular series “The Glory,” passed away at 52.

She had been battling an ischemic stroke. 

Her agency, BILLIONS, confirmed the news of her death. 

They stated that the actress died on September 30, 2024, at 2:50 am after suffering a cerebral infarction.

"This is actress Park Jia’s agency, BILLIONS.

We are deeply saddened to deliver this heartbreaking and unfortunate news.

Park Jia passed away today (September 30) at 2:50 a.m. KST after battling a cerebral infarction. She was 52 years old.

The funeral hall for the deceased has been set up in Room 2 at Asan Medical Center. The funeral procession is scheduled for 10 a.m. KST on October 2."

Cerebral Infarction is another term for ischemic stroke. 

She had also been dealing with an undisclosed illness before her death.

Park Ji Ah's death has sparked grief among her fans and colleagues. Many have taken to social media to express their condolences.

Her agency announced that the funeral will be held on October 2 at Asan Medical Center in Seoul.

What is Ischemic Stroke?

An ischemic stroke occurs when blood flow to the brain is cut off. This causes cell death due to lack of oxygen and nutrients.

This type of stroke accounts for about 85% of all stroke cases. Various factors, including thrombosis and embolism, can cause it. 

Symptoms include sudden weakness, numbness, slurred speech, and other neurological deficits.

scraped_articles.title: Zayn Malik Reveals Regrets About Being A One Direction Member
scraped_articles.meta_description: Zayn Malik revealed one of the things he regretted when he was still a member of the One Direction group.
scraped_articles.content:
Zayn Malik Reveals Regrets About Being A One Direction Member

Zayn Malik Reveals Regrets About Being A One Direction Member

Zayn Malik revealed one of the things he regretted when he was still a member of the One Direction group. He regretted being too "emo" so he couldn't enjoy moments with other personnel.

"The main thing that makes me feel guilty when I look back on my life is not enjoying enough moments with the band (One Direction)," Zayn said on the Zach Sang Show, as reported by Billboard.

"I didn't understand the importance of trying to be happy. I felt the teenage angst that plagued me. I was like, 'It's cool to be moody all the time'. That's just a loser trait. Honestly," he continued.

Zayn then began to realize that when he got older. He learned a lesson that every human being should be kind.

The Pillowtalk singer also admitted that he finally realized he needed to be a person who made others comfortable when interacting. She describes that role as the sun shining on people's day, instead of clouds full of negative energy.

"I felt like I was taking things too seriously at the time. I'm grateful to be happier now," Zayn says.

"I can really enjoy things and have a bit of my own perspective, like a glass half full versus a glass half empty," he continues.

Zayn Malik started his career as a member of the boy band One Direction before embarking on a solo career. He joined the boy band, consisting of Louis Tomlinson, Harry Styles, Liam Payne, and Niall Horan.

However, he finally decided to leave the boy band in March 2015. Zayn then continued his solo career by releasing the albums Mind of Mine (2016), Icarus Fallas (2018), and Nobody Is Listening (2021).

Zayn will also release a new album titled Room Under the Stars on May 17, 2024. The album is Zayn's comeback after a three-year hiatus from releasing a full album.

Room Under the Stairs became Zayn Malik's first album, which was released under the Mercury Records music label. The record label houses a line of other musicians, such as Noah Kahan, Post Malone, and Lily Rose.

According to Rolling Stone's report, the album was produced with Dave Cobb. The music producer is known for working on the rock genres of Chris Stapleton, Brandi Carlile, and Lady Gaga.

30 Morning Motivational Quotes: Words to Kickstart Your Day with Positivity

These inspiring words can uplift your spirit, boost your energy, and help you face the day with a positive mindset. (Photo by Sandra Kaas on Unsplash)

30 Morning Motivational Quotes: Words to Kickstart Your Day with Positivity

Morning motivational quotes have the power to change the way we approach each day. By reading these quotes, we can fill the day with positivity and motivation.

As we face life's challenges and possibilities, starting the day with an uplifting message can provide success and happiness in living the day.

This article has compiled some of the best morning motivational quotes to help you kickstart your day with confidence and optimism.

These inspiring words can uplift your spirits, boost your energy, and help you face the day positively. Join us as we explore 30 morning motivational quotes. Let them inspire you as you take on your journey each morning.

A. Best Morning Motivational Quotes

1. “She woke up every morning with the option of being anyone she wished. How beautiful it was that she always chose herself.” — Tyler Kent White

2. “When I’m just waking up I like to keep a space for my own thoughts and ideas. Checking my phone is not a priority of mine.” — Andre D. Wagner

3. "Mornings are like nature in spring… humming with the sounds of life and the promise of a fresh new day!" — LeAura Alderson

4. "Every morning is a beautiful morning." —Terri Guillemets

5. "Make each day your masterpiece." — John Wooden

6. "Prayer is the key of the morning and the bolt of the evening." — Mahatma Gandhi

7. "The morning was full of sunlight and hope." — Kate Chopin

8. “The next morning dawned bright and sweet, like ribbon candy.“ — Sarah Addison Allen

9. “I remind myself every morning: Nothing I say this day will teach me anything. So, if I’m going to learn, I must do it by listening." — Larry King

10. “Think in the morning. Act in the noon. Eat in the evening. Sleep in the night.” — William Blake

B. Morning Inspirational Quotes to Encourage You

1. "Embrace the dawn with open arms, let its energy awaken your spirit, and embark on a journey filled with possibilities." - Unknown

2. "Today is your canvas. Paint it with vibrant colors, fueled by the boundless energy within you." - Unknown

3. "Good morning! Let your energy be contagious today, inspiring those around you to strive for greatness." - Unknown

4. "Rise above the challenges, greet the morning with vigor, and let your energy propel you towards success." - Unknown

5. "Good morning! Channel your inner strength, ignite your enthusiasm, and let your energy illuminate the world." - Unknown

6. "Every morning is a chance to ignite your energy and set your soul on fire. Seize it with passion!" - Unknown

7. "As the sun rises, so does your potential. Harness your energy, embrace the day, and make it extraordinary." - Unknown

8. "Good morning! Let your energy radiate positivity, enthusiasm, and unstoppable determination." - Unknown

9. "Wake up with a smile, fuel your day with optimism, and let your energy ignite the path to greatness." - Unknown

10. "Rise and shine! Today is another opportunity to unleash your inner power and conquer the world." - Unknown

C. Morning Inspirational Quotes to Uplift You

1. “Get up in the morning and look at the world in a way that takes nothing for granted. Everything is phenomenal; everything is incredible; never treat life casually. To be spiritual is to be amazed.” —Abraham Joshua Heschel

2. “Each morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most.” —Buddha

3. "When I wake up every morning, I thank God for the new day." —F. Sionil Jose

4. “Waking up early, connecting with nature, and having my quiet time are priorities to me, and they are non-negotiable.” —Danette May

5. “The day will be what you make it, so rise, like the sun, and burn.” —William C. Hannan

6. "Do and act on what you believe to be right, and you'll wake up the next morning feeling good about yourself." —Janet Reno

7. "No matter how bad things are, you can at least be happy that you woke up this morning." —D. L. Hughley

8. "Morning is an important time of day, because how you spend your morning can often tell you what kind of day you are going to have." —Lemony Snicket

9. "Now that your eyes are open, make the sun jealous with your burning passion to start the day. Make the sun jealous or stay in bed." —Malak El Halabi

10. "One key to success is to have lunch at the time of day most people have breakfast." —Robert Brault

Sussex is the perfect place for every family to call home. Photo by Nick, pexels

7 Best Places To Live In Sussex For Families

Are you looking for the perfect place to raise your family in Sussex, England? It's right here!

We have compiled a list of the seven best places for families to live in Sussex. From charming historic towns to bustling suburban communities, there is something for everyone. Let's explore the top picks for family-friendly living in beautiful Sussex.




Best Places To Live In Sussex For Families

Photo: flickr/Nigel Turner

1. Lewes

First on our list is Lewes, a picturesque market town. Lewes is famous for its historical architecture and vibrant community. It is known for excellent schools, parks, and recreational facilities; Lewes offers a safe and welcoming environment for families to thrive.

flickr/Twin Group

2. Eastbourne

Next up is Eastbourne, a coastal town with stunning beaches and many family-friendly activities. From beach days to shopping at local markets, Eastbourne has something for everyone to enjoy.

flickr/Aivaras Zukis

3. Seaford

Seaford is the perfect choice for those seeking a quieter coastal community. With its stunning cliffs and beaches, Seaford provides a peaceful setting for families to relax and unwind. The town also boasts excellent schools and recreational facilities for children of all ages.

If you're looking for a taste of history and charm, Rye is the place to be.

4. Rye

This medieval town offers picturesque streets, quaint shops, and a close-knit community perfect for families. With its excellent schools and family-friendly activities, Rye is a great place to call home.

flickr/Howard Somerville

5. Alfriston

Nestled in the South Downs National Park, Alfriston is a hidden gem for families seeking serenity and natural beauty. It is famous for its charming village atmosphere and stunning countryside views. Alfriston has a peaceful retreat for families looking to escape the hustle and bustle of city life.

flickr/Mick the Miller

6. Mayfield

Mayfield is an ideal choice for those who prefer a more rural setting. Surrounded by rolling hills and picturesque countryside, Mayfield offers a tranquil environment for families to enjoy outdoor activities and explore nature together.

flickr/Carl English

7. Burgess Hill

Last but not least, Burgess Hill is a thriving suburban community with excellent schools, parks, and recreational facilities. With its convenient location and family-friendly amenities, Burgess Hill is a wonderful place for families to settle down and enjoy all Sussex offers.

In conclusion, Sussex offers diverse family-friendly communities, each with unique charm and attractions.

Whether you prefer coastal living or rural tranquility, Sussex is the perfect place for every family to call home. Consider these top picks when looking for the best place for your family to live in Sussex.

scraped_articles.title: Sylvester Stallone Has a 'Permanent Injury' Because of Expendables 1
scraped_articles.meta_description: Sylvester Stallone Has a 'Permanent Injury' Because of Expendables 1
scraped_articles.content:
Sylvester Stallone Has a 'Permanent Injury' Because of Expendables 1

Sylvester Stallone Has a 'Permanent Injury' Because of Expendables 1

Sylvester Stallone warned those who want to be involved in action movies that they should think twice about doing action scenes alone without a substitute.

He said this because he suffered an injury while doing an action scene alone without a substitute while filming The Expendables (2010).

"There's something beautiful about doing those action scenes alone," Syl said in an episode of The Family Stallone, as reported by the Hollywood Reporter on Wednesday (2/21).

"But there is something not very beautiful after doing that," he continued.

Stallone recalled that when filming the first Expendables, he was required to be involved in a fight scene. At that time, he decided not to use stunts.

"I remember one slam, and I could feel one punch," Syl says. "I never recovered from Expendables 1."

"After that movie, I was never physically the same again. So I warn you, never do action scenes alone," Syl said.


Stallone is said to be scheduled to undergo his seventh back surgery soon. The operation is said to clean up a large herniated disc in his back.

Meanwhile, Stallone returns to the Expendables saga in the fourth film, released in September 2023. The film is also a sequel to The Expendables 3, which aired in 2014.

Expend4bles again stars Jason Statham, Sylvester Stallone, Dolph Lundgren, and Randy Couture. Iko Uwais also makes his debut in the franchise as the main villain.

The film is directed by Scott Waugh, who previously directed the movies Act of Valor (2012) and Need for Speed (2014). The Expendables 4 screenplay was written by Spencer Cohen with Max Adams and John Joseph Connolly.


This film series was first released in 2010 through a film entitled The Expendables. The story of the elite mercenary gang continued with The Expendables 2 (2012) and The Expendables 3 (2014).

scraped_articles.title: Japan's Lawson Once Launched A Unique 'Tasteless' Candy
scraped_articles.meta_description: Japan's Lawson Once Launched A Unique 'Tasteless' Candy
scraped_articles.meta_keywords: Japan's Lawson Once Launched A Unique 'Tasteless' Candy
scraped_articles.content:
Japan's Lawson Once Launched A Unique 'Tasteless' Candy

Japan's Lawson Once Launched A Unique 'Tasteless' Candy

Japan once introduced a unique candy called Aji no Shinai? Ame (Tasteless? Candy) at Lawson convenience stores. 

Priced at 189 yen for seven pieces, this candy claims to have no sweetness or flavor, providing a general lack of taste. 

Made from synthetic sugar substitute polydextrose and organic sugar substitute erythritol, the candy was tested and found to have a very weak taste, resembling watered-down sports drinks with minimal sweetness. 

The idea behind these candies is to prevent mouth and throat dryness without the need for added sugar, making them suitable for situations like crowded trains or mask-wearing. 

The Tasteless Candy was created as part of Lawson's Test Product Election in 2022, where customers could vote for their favorite experimental products, including this unique candy.

7 Best Ohio Urban Legends to Give You Nightmares

Who knows, you may just come face to face with one of these creatures in the dead of night. Stay safe, and happy ghost hunting! (Photo by Osman SRAN on pexels)

7 Best Ohio Urban Legends to Give You Nightmares

Ohio is home to some of the most chilling urban legends passed down through generations. These stories are not for the faint of heart. They will give you goosebumps and send shivers down your spine. From werewolves to combat divers, Ohio has many terrifying tales that will haunt your dreams. Here are the seven best Ohio urban legends guaranteed to give you nightmares.

1. The Werewolf Of Defiance:

This legend tells the story of a man who transforms into a werewolf under the full moon in Defiance, Ohio. Locals claim to have seen this creature creeping around the streets at night.

Werewolf howling at the moon and terrorizing anyone who crosses its path.

2. Loveland Frog Men:

In Loveland, Ohio, reports of frog-like creatures have been circulating for years.

These humanoid amphibians are said to inhabit the local waterways. Frog Men have been known to scare unsuspecting passersby with their eerie presence.

Satan's Hollow is also known as the Tunnel to Hell. 

3. Satan's Hollow:

This legend revolves around a hidden tunnel in Blue Ash, Ohio. It is said to be a gateway to the underworld. It is said to be a gateway to the underworld. 

Rumors of occult rituals and sightings of demonic figures have made this location a popular spot for paranormal enthusiasts.

4. Cry Baby Bridge: 

This urban legend centers around bridges throughout Ohio where a baby's cries can be heard late at night.

Legend has it that a mother threw her unwanted baby off the bridge. And now, its ghost haunts the area, crying out for help.

5. Lake Hope Furnace:

Located in Lake Hope State Park, this legend tells the story of an abandoned furnace. It is where strange occurrences have been reported. 

Some say they have seen ghostly figures wandering around the furnace, while others claim to have heard eerie screams coming from the depths of the structure.

Ohio

6. Hatchet Man Road:

This urban legend revolves around a road in Columbus, Ohio. It is a man with a hatchet is said to roam the area, looking for unsuspecting victims to terrorize. Locals warn against driving down this road alone at night, as many have reported seeing the ghostly figure lurking in the shadows.

mummy

7. Eugene the Mummy:

In Cincinnati, Ohio, there is a legend of a mummy named Eugene. The mummy is said to haunt the halls of a local museum. Visitors claim to have seen his preserved body wandering the museum at night, his empty eye sockets staring back at them with a malevolent gaze.

These Ohio urban legends may be stories, but the fear and unease they evoke are real. Whether you believe in the supernatural or not, these tales make anyone think twice before exploring the dark corners of Ohio.

 If you ever find yourself in the Buckeye State, be sure to keep an eye out for these scary legends that have been haunting Ohio for years. Who knows, you may just come face to face with one of these creatures in the dead of night. Stay safe, and happy ghost hunting!
